author: eps1lon
message: [test] Handle CLI assertions where no "Compiling..." log is present (#85499)

files.patch:
@@ -28,7 +28,7 @@ describe('app-dir - server source maps edge runtime', () => {
         )
       })
       expect(normalizeCliOutput(next.cliOutput.slice(outputIndex))).toContain(
-        '\nError: rsc-error-log' +
+        'Error: rsc-error-log' +
           '\n    at logError (app/rsc-error-log/page.js:2:17)' +
           '\n    at Page (app/rsc-error-log/page.js:6:3)' +
           '\n  1 | function logError() {' +

+        ' тип Error: ssr-throw' +

           '\n  2 |' +
